reviews.text: Nice place to stay in Clearfield. Desk people are very helpful. Rooms are standard Hampton Inn.
reviews.title: Good place to stay

reviews.text: Well kept. Undergoing new renovation in the breakfast lounge area. Close to I-80 for an easy on/off. Walmart and Lowes right next door.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: I stay at this hotel twice a week on business, been staying since July 2012. Hotel is off highway but can't hear traffic, staff is friendly, clean rooms, great breakfast selection. Has indoor heated pool, but don't feel heated. Hotel is getting ready to be renevated. I highly recommend
reviews.title: One of the nicest Hampton Inn's I've stayed in!

reviews.text: Road trip. We arrived late and left early but everything seemed new. Clean. The staff is amazingly friendly. The location is conveniently located near the highway. The beds were comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice place. Above average for hampton inn.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stay at many Hampton Inn's while I travel for work, and I can say that this is one of the better ones. It's one of the smaller Hampton inns by size, I saw a few nights where they appeared to be full, so I would guess to make your reservation early if you plan on staying here. It is right off the highway and easy to get in and out of.
reviews.title: A great place to stay

reviews.text: We were caught in a snow storm on I80, and we decided to stop for the rest of the day. We like Hampton Inns, and so we chose this property after exiting the highway. Since many of the Hampton Inns look alike, it was like "coming home". As expected, the rooms were large and well appointed, and breakfast was satisfactory. Unless we end up in a bad one, we will stick with our decision to stay at Hampton Inns.
reviews.title: Reliably good

reviews.text: After driving hours along Route 80,we decided to stop for the night. I called ahead to the hotel to make sure there were rooms available and spoke to Amber who was delightful and very helpful. We had the speediest check-in ever and were in our rooms in a flash. Amber then directed us to a variety of places where we could get a quick bite to eat. Hampton Inn is our first choice hotel everywhere, we love the consistency of the quality. This location was no exception. The fitness center was well-kept and the machines were properly maintained.
reviews.title: A restful, wonderful night

reviews.text: At breakfast we were again impressed with the staff - the woman in charge of the setup (did not get her name) brought us and everybody else, water bottles and breakfast mints (who knew there were separate breakfast mints?) and gave us a heads-up on the Sunday flea market nearby if we had time. We took her advice and had a wonderful time. There were closer hotels to Route 80, but we are glad we drove the extra 4 miles to sleep in the Hampton Inn Clearfield.
reviews.title: Nice Place but Bad Check-In Experience

reviews.text: I must start off by saying that the hotel is nice. It is not the most up to date but (like others have stated) it is very clean. The room was quiet and comfortable. The bathroom was ordinary and again very clean. The breakfast was standard fare and good.
reviews.title: Nice clean hotel in the process of renovations

reviews.text: The issue my group had was at check-in. We reserved three rooms. The first party arrived before us ( they called to say they had arrived). When I went to check in the girl at the front desk (who was sloppily dressed) asked if I wanted to check in all three rooms. I told her no just one and that one party should have arrived. She said no they did not (causing me to worry) and that she could only check in all three rooms together. When I continued to argue, she realized that one party did check in. So she said that she needed to check in the remaining two. I argued again that I only wanted to check into one room. She finally said that was doable. Then I told her that I wanted the room on my credit card, not the one used to hold the reservation. She said that she could not do that. In the meantime the third party came to check in. After pressing many buttons, she printed out two confirmations on my credit card and one on the third party's card. In the end we went to our rooms not knowing how much or on what cards the rooms would be charged. She told us that it was only her second day on the front desk. The next morning the very competent girl at the front desk seemed to straighten everything out. She said that the girl from the day before had been working for three weeks on the front desk. I will still check out my credit card statement for accuracy.
reviews.title: Great hotel good people

reviews.text: Stayed here for one night while on a road trip. Friendly staff at the front desk and breakfast area. The food was well stocked. Lots of seating. Clean.
reviews.title: This is why we stay at Hampton Inn - predictability

reviews.text: The room was clean and spacious. No complaints. Did not have time to use the pool.
reviews.title: Immaculately Clean!

reviews.text: I would stay here again.
reviews.title: Very clean, convenient location

reviews.text: I don't know if others have this feeling, but generally when I stay at a hotel, I'm reluctant to take my shoes or slippers off and go barefoot. I did not have this feeling at this Hampton Inn. Everything seemed immaculately clean and I love the fact that all bed linens are laundered for each guest--even the duvet covers!
reviews.title: Travelling on I-80

reviews.text: This hotel is located conveniently off of I-80 near Central PA. Everything was extremely clean, from the bathroom, lobby, gym, pool, room, etc. Breakfast had a good variety. Staff was friendly. Freshly baked cookies and coffee in the evening were a bonus. Appreciated having a refrigerator in the room. Internet worked well.
reviews.title: Very Nice
Getting Old and Tired (like me)!
reviews.text: This property needs some money put into it. The common areas are nice, but the rooms need a make over for sure. Had the property booked for two nights and canceled the second night (brand new Holiday inn next door).

Great location with close proximity to Route 80 and to good restaurants and stores in the area. This Hampton Inn has all the things you would expect to find at a Hampton Inn, i.e. it is very quiet, the breakfast is great, the parking is ample and access is no problem.
reviews.title: Clearfield Hampton Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Actually, this room seemed a bit pricey at first. But it was well laid out and very comfortable and clean. Restaurants are a short drive from Hotel. Typical Hampton Inn breakfast included with a broad menu. You can also paper-bag breakfast if you need to move on quickly.
reviews.title: Quiet room just off the Interstate.

reviews.text: Easily accessed off I-80. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: 3Cs ~ Contemporary, Clean, Comfy

reviews.text: After a long day of travel we NEEDED a hotel. Checked in to this Hampton Inn and was pleasantly surprised. The entry is open and filled with very contemporary decor. A coffee and tea bar awaits you in the lobby. The rooms were typical but very clean and updated. Linens were wonderful - crisp clean sheets and fluffy duvet.
reviews.title: Very Clean
